meanings.definition: A woman who supports, protects, or champions a person, cause, or organization.
meanings.sent1: The kind patroness donated money to help the local animal shelter.
meanings.sent2: The patroness of the arts generously funded the new museum exhibit.
meanings.sent3: The patroness of the bake sale brought in a mountain of cookies to support the cause.
meanings.sent4: She was like a patroness of hope, guiding others through difficult times.
meanings.sent5: The patroness of education worked tirelessly to ensure every child had access to books.

meanings.definition: A woman who is a customer, especially a regular one, of a store, restaurant, or other business.
meanings.sent1: The loyal patroness always ordered the same coffee at the cafe.
meanings.sent2: As a patroness of the local bookstore, she knew all the staff by name.
meanings.sent3: The patroness of the bakery had a sweet tooth that never seemed to be satisfied.
meanings.sent4: She was a patroness of fashion, always keeping up with the latest trends.
meanings.sent5: The patroness of the diner enjoyed her usual breakfast every morning.
